alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Salt Lake...east central Davis and southwestern Morgan Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 415 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Farmington, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bountiful, Farmington, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, West Bountiful and Fruit Heights. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 315 and 325. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
